app_info.name: 1122 E-Ambulance Booking
app_info.description: A government-affiliated app for free ambulance bookings based on patient critical levels, ensuring timely and efficient emergency medical services.

ambulance_types.description: For non-critical patients requiring simple transport to medical facilities.
For patients requiring continuous medical monitoring during transit.
For highly critical patients requiring ICU-level support during transport.
Specialized ambulance for transporting newborns and infants in need of medical care.

user_feedback.comments: The ambulance arrived on time and the ALS team provided excellent care during transport.
The ambulance was not available at the time of booking, and the booking was cancelled without prior notice.
The service was good, but the waiting time could have been shorter.

changes: Added Neonatal Ambulance option for infant care.
Improved user interface for booking process.
Enhanced notification system for real-time updates.
Added feedback system for users to rate services.
Fixed minor bugs in booking confirmation process.
